messages.subject: Owatonna Unschooling Gathering- Minnesota- UPdate
messages.msgSnippet: We got even better room deals!   Informal Unschooling Adventure at the Great Serengeti Indoor Waterpark Owatonna, Minnesota Thursday & Friday, Feb. 26th and
messages.messageBody:
We got even better room deals!
 
Informal Unschooling Adventure at the Great Serengeti Indoor Waterpark Owatonna, Minnesota
Thursday & Friday, Feb. 26th and 27th(Sat and Sunday are booked up)
Located inside award winning Holiday Inn/behind Cabella's--1 hour South of Minneapolis
http://www.hiowatonna.com/waterpark.phtml

Come hang out for one or both days at the waterpark, if you live nearby or book your room at: 507-446-8900 Group Name--M.U.S. (MN Un-Schoolers) Limited room availability on Friday the 27th. Call now or asap to book your rooms early, if Friday night or a particular room style is desired. Wrist bands for waterpark good for day of arrival and next day until check out. See hotel website for details on all room amenities.
Thursday Group rates:
 Two queen beds ~ $89 a night-- includes 5 wristbands.
 King bed and pull out sofa ~ $89 a night--includes 5 wristbands.
King Deluxe Suite ~ $149 a night--includes 7 wristbands
Kid Suite ~ $149 a night. Includes bunks beds and kitchenette and 7 wristbands
Friday Group rates (weekend rates are higher):
Two queen beds ~ $109 a night-- includes 5 wristbands.
King bed and pull out sofa ~ $109 a night--includes 5 wristbands.
King Deluxe Suite~ $169 a night--includes 7 wristbands
 Kid Suite ~ $169 a night. Includes bunks beds and kitchenette and 7 wristbands
Wristbands for the waterpark are to use the day of arrival (see waterpark hours).
Waterpark wristbands for the day will be $6 for homeschoolers ( that is a 50% discount)
Join :
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/OWUNG/
for more informaton and to see who is coming!
 
Event organizer: Heather Brown for UnschoolingMN
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/?yguid=269399205
 
 
 

 
Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow.blogspot.com/

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/
